title: the zed
body: zed is a complicated champion for someone who hasn't played it before, that's what happened to me. I was so eager to have zed so I bought a boosted account. I regret buying it after my first game because I didn't really know how to play zed. Then I realized how to when I reviewed his skills. I said to myself "you just need the perfect timing", so then I did. every game I play using zed when I "R" I just have to smooth the flow. as simple as the following steps: W, R, A REALLY QUICK Q, E, W and wait for the death mark.

replies.body: I hope you're joking because buying a boosted account is going to get you banned and you just outright admitted to it
but i don't use it anymore so what's the point
Bahaha you idiot it's not the fact that you're still using it or not, its the fact that you bought one in the first place
either way it was only 20 bucks'

A admitting to buying a boosted account is only going to get it banned
and
B zed is a champ for scrubs
Coming from a dude named Talon12 that's rich.
